reviewText: This tape is used at my senior center and I like to use this tape when Iam not able to go to center.  I used to have back pain and since using tape much better recommend to everyone even if you very mobil

We are using this at our retirement center and are enjoying the movements and the comments by Billie.  We work out on Wednesdays and there are about 4 of us who really enjoy the hour of exercise.  Thanks for the good stretches.

Here is your map to the workings of commodity, stock & index options. Full explanation of how these markets work, how to read between the lines of the financial pages, how options are priced, benefits of buying vs.  writing, what "spread" and "market" orders are and when  to use them, how to use volatility and more. Then hear an insider tell you  how to pick a broker and how to keep your money from being eaten up by  commissions. Loads of practical information to steer you into $.
